list.abs: ...数目是不同的，如芒萁仅有一条；铁角蕨科、金星蕨科的沼泽蕨（Thelypteris palustris）为2条；蹄盖蕨科的种类虽也具2条，但在叶 …
... 8 猴腿蹄盖蕨 Athytium multidentatum 9 毛叶沼泽蕨 Thelypteris palustris 10 粗茎鳞毛蕨 Dryopteris crassirhizoma.

means.word_mean: 1. marsh ferns: in some classification systems considered part of genus Dryopteris in family Dryopteridaceae
